'''Skalanis''' was the [[wild elf]] champion on [[Evermeet]] in [[1367 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Skalanis wandered the isle's forests acting as an advocate and spokesman for the various wild elf bands.
document_data.Relationship: Skalanis respected and obeyed Queen [[Amlaruil Moonflower]] but did not acknowledge her as the ruler of all elvenkind.
